slide.title: Using tidy configuration files
slide.blurb: Almost all of the wide range of abilites found in the tidy extension can be controlled by setting the values of tidy configuration options. These options can be set by:

list.bullet: loading a tidy configuration file using %tidy_load_config()%
having a default configuration file loaded by setting the %tidy.deafult_config% PHP configuration directive.

slide.blurb: *NOTE:* You can access a list of all of the tidy configuration options in the output of %phpinfo()%
